required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Lipid Peroxidation in Workers Exposed to Al,Ga,In,As,and Sb in Optoelectronic Industry

lead_sponsor.agency: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kaohsiung Medical University Chung-Ho Memorial Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate whether exposure to Al, Ga, In, As, and Sb induces lipid peroxidation in humans. Whole blood and urine levels of 170 workers were analysed by use of ICP-MS. MDA, the product of lipid peroxidation was determined by HPLC

detailed_description.textblock: If MDA as an index of lipid peroxidation can be induced by these metals. We will suggest reducing exposure to these metals

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Optoelectronic workers
Exclusion Criteria:
- Office workers

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Public Health Kaohsiung Medical University
